live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
36738.summary: Some customers in the Panama Flats area of Victoria are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36738.title: Apr 23 – Victoria (Panama Flats Area) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
